### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17860](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17860.html) (fuzz: BIP 42, BIP 30, CVE-2018-17144 by MarcoFalke)
* [#17777](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17777.html) (tests: Add fuzzing harness for DecodeHexTx(â¦) by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
